description:
Parameters for setting a value at a path.

Used by `setup_set` to write configuration values at arbitrary JSON paths.

# Fields * `path` - Configuration path to modify (e.g., "/audio/output/speaker/1/gain") * `value` - New value to set (type depends on path)

# Example - Set speaker gain ```json { "path": "/audio/output/speaker/1/gain", "value": -3.0 } ```

# Example - Set input name ```json { "path": "/audio/input/analog/1/name", "value": "Microphone A" } ```

value.description: Value to set at the path

title: JapiSetParams
